name: unofficial-ravensburger-playhub-mcp
description: MCP server for finding Disney Lorcana TCG events

scripts.build: npm run check:node && rm -rf dist && tsc
scripts.test: npm run check:node && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit: node --test dist/test/api.test.js dist/test/formatters.test.js dist/test/http.test.js dist/test/registrations.test.js dist/test/standings.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: npm run check:node && c8 --exclude='**/test/**' --reporter=text --reporter=lcov node --test dist/test/api.test.js dist/test/formatters.test.js dist/test/http.test.js dist/test/registrations.test.js dist/test/standings.test.js
scripts.test:coverage:all: npm run check:node && c8 --exclude='**/test/**' --reporter=text --reporter=lcov node --test dist
